  • Method Details

    • merge

      public void merge(SceneAnalysisCollection sceneAnalysisCollection)
      Add the SceneAnalysis objects to sceneAnalyses. The result Mat and the Contours objects are overwritten.
      Parameters:
      sceneAnalysisCollection - the SceneAnalysisCollection to merge.

    • add

      public void add(SceneAnalysis sceneAnalysis)

    • getLastScene

      public Optional<Scene> getLastScene()
      The scene that represents the collection, and is used for illustration. For motion analysis, the last scene is used.

    • getResults

      public org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat getResults()
      The results of a multi-scene analysis are stored here. This can be for actions such as motion analysis, or for aggregating matches across multiple scenes.
